Reviews.Title: wireless cam
Reviews.Author: jzeledon
Reviews.Content: this product is not the best!!! driver doesnt work well, either is missing files or gives a lot of errors when making it to work. works at the first time then stop working for missing a specific code saying " class does not exist.errorcode=0x583"

Reviews.Title: 2.4g 4 channel weather proof camera
Reviews.Author: aimotel
Reviews.Content: price is good I use to buy before this product is ok for 250 sq foot small area work but large area not work as well.with microphone everything is good work gteat in office and one buldingI would say product is good and buy
